spec.name: BOS config admin API routes
spec.description:
Welcome to the reference documentation for the Spinalcore Digital Twin REST API!

To learn about the common use cases and concept of Spinalcore REST APIs, check out our resource center (https://resourcecenter.fr.spinalcom.com/ressources-d√©veloppeur).

In addition to Spinalcore API Reference, we also provide complete documentation for BOS config adminnistration API, that need to install and implement Spinalcore Digital Twin Operating System on their built environment.
